chestGrid.contextLabel: Chest {{chestNum, number}} of {{totalChests, number}}, Row {{row, number}} Column {{col, number}}

chestHint.colorGold: There's some Gold hiding somewhere in a $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}}) box.
chestHint.colorGold_blank: There's some Gold hiding somewhere in a [color] box.
chestHint.colorMimic: There is a Mimic among the $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}} boxes.
chestHint.colorMimic_blank: There is a Mimic among the [color] boxes.
chestHint.colorMoreMimics: There are more Mimics in $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}}) than $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param2}}) boxes.
chestHint.colorMoreMimics_blank: There are more Mimics in [color] than [color] boxes.
chestHint.colorNoGold: None of the $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}}) boxes contain any Gold.
chestHint.colorNoGold_blank: None of the [color] boxes contain any Gold.
chestHint.colorNoMimic: There is no Mimic among the $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}}) boxes.
chestHint.colorNoMimic_blank: There is no Mimic among the [color] boxes.
chestHint.colorNumMimics_num_one: {{count, number}} Mimic is hiding in a $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}}) box.
chestHint.colorNumMimics_num_other: {{count, number}} Mimics are hiding in $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}}) boxes.
chestHint.colorSameMimics: Same number of Mimics in $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param1}}) and $t(chestHint.chestColors.{{param2}}) boxes.
chestHint.colorSameMimics_blank: Same number of Mimics in [color] and [color] boxes.
chestHint.directionGold_blank: The chest [direction] from me has some Gold in it.
chestHint.directionMimic_blank: The box [direction] from me is a Mimic.
chestHint.directionNotGold_blank: The box [direction] from me has no Gold.
chestHint.directionNotMimic_blank: The box [direction] from me isn't a Mimic.
chestHint.mimicsNotSameColor: Not all the Mimics are the same color.
chestHint.mimicsSameColor: All the Mimics are the same color.
chestHint.rankGold: There's some Gold somewhere in the $t(chestHint.chestRank.{{param1}}).
chestHint.rankGold_blank: There's some Gold somewhere in the [row / column].
chestHint.rankMinimumMimics_blank: The [row / column] has at least [#] mimics.
chestHint.rankMinimumMimics_num_one: The $t(chestHint.chestRank.{{param1}}) has at least {{count, number}} Mimic.
chestHint.rankMinimumMimics_num_other: The $t(chestHint.chestRank.{{param1}}) has at least {{count, number}} Mimics.
chestHint.rankMoreMimics: The $t(chestHint.chestRank.{{param1}}) has more Mimics than the $t(chestHint.chestRank_directionOnly.{{param2}}).
chestHint.rankMoreMimics_blank: The [row / column] has more Mimics than the [row / column].
chestHint.rankNoGold_blank: There's no Gold in the [row / column].
chestHint.rankSameMimics: Same number of Mimics in $t(chestHint.chestRank_directionOnly.{{param1}}) and $t(chestHint.chestRank.{{param2}})s.
chestHint.rankSameMimics_blank: Same number of Mimics in [row / column] and [row / column].

chestSelector.ariaLabel: $t(chestSelector.color.{{color}}) chest in row {{row, number}}, column {{column, number}}

solutionDisplay.noSolutionYet: There is no solution to display yet. Please press "Solve" to attempt to generate a solution for the current puzzle.

solutionErrors.errorsOccurred: There are errors in your game configuration which would result in no valid solution. Please correct the errors listed below before trying to solve again.
solutionErrors.noValidSolution: No valid solution was found for the puzzle. Please double check the chest colors, hints, and contents, and try again.

solverError.contentsTooFew: The total contents specified in the game info is insufficient for the number of chests. There are {{numChests, number}} chests but the contents specified would fill only {{numSpecified, number}}. Please update the content hints in the game info so that the sum does not add up to fewer than the number of chests. Opting to leave at least one optional value blank will also resolve this error, as the omitted value will automatically take up any leftover chests.
solverError.contentsTooMany: The total contents specified in the game info exceeds the number of chests. There are {{numChests, number}} chests but the contents specified would fill {{numSpecified, number}}. Please update the content hints in the game info so that the sum does not exceed the number of chests.
solverError.specifiedGearTooMany: The number of chests containing 'Gear' exceeds the 'Gear' hint provided. $t(solverError.chests, { "count": {{gearSpecified}} }) containing 'Gear', but the hints indicate $t(solverError.canOnlyBe, { "count": {{numGear}} }). Please increase the 'Gear' hint in game info, or edit chests so that fewer contain 'Gear'.
solverError.specifiedGoldTooMany: The number of chests containing 'Gold' exceeds the 'Gold' hint provided. $t(solverError.chests, { "count": {{goldSpecified}} }) containing 'Gold', but the hints indicate $t(solverError.canOnlyBe, { "count": {{numGold}} }). Please increase the 'Gold' hint in game info, or edit chests so that fewer contain 'Gold'.
solverError.specifiedItemsTooMany: The number of chests containing 'Item' exceeds the 'Item' hint provided. $t(solverError.chests, { "count": {{itemsSpecified}} }) containing 'Item', but the hints indicate $t(solverError.canOnlyBe, { "count": {{numItems}} }). Please increase the 'Item' hint in game info, or edit chests so that fewer contain 'Item'.
solverError.specifiedMimicsTooMany: The number of chests containing 'Mimic' exceeds the 'Mimic' hint provided. $t(solverError.chests, { "count": {{mimicsSpecified}} }) containing 'Mimic', but the hints indicate $t(solverError.canOnlyBe, { "count": {{numMimics}} }). Please increase the 'Mimic' hint in game info, or edit chests so that fewer contain 'Mimic'.

mixed.notType: Please enter a value in the expected format

number.max: Please enter a number less than or equal to {{max, number}}
number.min: Please enter a number greater than or equal to {{min, number}}
